In connection with a securitization transaction sponsored by Cellco in which the Issuer will issue Notes secured by a pool of Receivables
consisting of device payment plan agreements, certain of the Originators and/or the Master Trust have transferred a pool of Receivables and
related property, and any of the Originators and/or the Master Trust may from time to time transfer additional pools of Receivables and related
property to the Depositor, who will transfer them to the Issuer. The Issuer will engage the Servicer to service the Receivables.
The parties agree as follows:
